Desc: {c_gold}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging an enemy with a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill has up to a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to extend the duration of {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} second. Double this duration if it was a Critical Strike.
Name: Relentless Berserker's
